Summary: Biochemical reaction from o-demethyl apixaban to o-demethyl apixaban sulfate. This interaction is catalyzed by SULT1A1.
Biochemical reaction from apixaban to o-demethyl apixaban. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A5 or CYP3A4.
Transport from apixaban to apixaban. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCB1 or ABCG2.
